title: Honoring Lynne Freda upon the occasion of her designation for special recognition by the Callicoon Business Association
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Lynne  Freda upon the occasion of her
designation for special recognition by the  Callicoon  Business  Associ-
ation

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, Lynne Freda has given not only of her time and  energies  but
also of her competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently has
been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Lynne Freda upon the occasion of her designation for special recognition
by the Callicoon Business Association; and
  WHEREAS,  Lynne  Freda  grew  up  around the real estate business, and
spent her formative years in the Upper Delaware  Catskills,  but  headed
south  to Florida for college; after 26 years in the Sunshine State, she
came back to her hometown, working in the agency  started  by  her  dad,
Matthew  J.  Freda, and continued by her brother Tom, who is the broker,
and brother Joe, associate broker; and
  WHEREAS, Lynne Freda is a licensed real estate salesperson in both New
York and Pennsylvania; she is a member of the  National  Association  of
Realtors,  the  Sullivan  County  Board of Realtors, the Sullivan County
(NY) Multiple Listing Service, the Pike-Wayne (PA) Board of Realtors and
the Pike-Wayne MLS; and
  WHEREAS, Lynne Freda also serves as President of the  Callicoon  Busi-
ness  Association,  and  sits  on  the  Damascus Township Zoning Hearing
Board; in the past, she worked in television news in the Tampa,  Florida
area as an executive producer; and
  WHEREAS,  With  her throughout has been her daughter, Casey, who feels
privileged to be a part of her life and rejoices  in  her  achievements;
and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of  this Legislative Body that those who
enhance the life in their community and have shown a long and  sustained
commitment to excellence certainly have earned recognition and applause;
now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Lynne Freda upon the  occasion  of  her  designation  for  special
recognition by the Callicoon Business Association; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Lynne Freda.
